pkgmetadata.longdescription: # matlablibSuite of Matlab utilities ported over to Python ## InstallationRun the following to install :```pythonpip install matlablib```## Usage``` pythonimport matlablib as ml from matlablib import closefigures from matlablib import cc from matlablib import keyboard from matlablib import sayHey from matlablib import quit_early from matlablib import kill_background from matlablib import getPythonVariables ```### Say hey``` pythonml.sayHey```
